data.title: Important Information for Cannabis Distributors
data.excerpt: As a cannabis distributor, you must electronically file your cannabis tax returns and pay the cultivation tax and cannabis excise tax due to the California Department of Tax and Fee Administration (CDTFA).
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
tags: Department of Tax and Fee Administration
